sources.title: Painted Faces (1929) JOE E.  BROWN â™¦ Pre-Code Hollywood
sources.description:
CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Joe E. Brown, Helen Foster, Dorothy Gulliver
Director: Albert S. Rogell
Another Gem from Tiffany Pictures! In this Pre-Code Melodrama, Joe E. Brown takes on a rare serious role. He plays a juror on a murder trial intent on uncovering the true villain among his fellow vaudevillians.

metadata.Plot: After a vaudeville performer is murdered backstage, framed-up evidence lead the police to arrest a troupe member. At his trial, Hermann, a Scandinavian clown known as Beppo, is the lone juror holding out against conviction and pleading for his innocence and acquittal.
metadata.Writer: Fanny Hatton, Frederic Hatton, Frances Hyland
metadata.Actors: Joe E. Brown, Helen Foster, Barton Hepburn
